title: The Face in the mirror ['I wonder']
brief_description: Shows how to sell at retail effectively by disclosing to the salesman how he appears in the eyes of prospective buyers. Demonstrates good methods by actual on-the-scene experiences of a skilled salesman who wonders why his own techniques sometimes fail. Follows a salesman on shopping expedition to demonstrate that basic selling techniques result in satisfied customers. Cast includes Ruth Mattison, James Kirkwood.
